We have two locations dedicated to serving your needs.

PRL has been supplying high-integrity castings and machining for over 50 years. Our team of specialized craftsmen at both locations are ready to provide you with finished components that will conform to the strictest military, nuclear, and commercial requirements.

We've achieved numerous ASME and U.S. Military certifications. Our dedication to precision and on-time delivery has helped earn PRL the trust of the most demanding customers.

Cornwall, Pennsylvania

Headquartered in Cornwall, PRL is a major supplier of high-precision castings to Military, Nuclear and Commercial sectors. Our expert team has qualified for and received numerous certifications by industry and government organizations. Capabilities at Cornwall include:

  • Foundry. PRL can provide castings up to 12,000 lbs.
  • AOD. Refining up to 18,500 lbs. per heat
  • Casting Upgrade. NAVSEA and ASME approved weld procedures
  • NAVSEA approved weld repairs
  • NDT. Broad range of NDT testing capabilities: Radiographic, Visual, Magnetic particle, Liquid Penetrant and Ultrasonic
  • Machining. Full-service manual and CNC Capabilities
  • Quality. Navy Nuclear Approved to perform level one work

Lebanon, Pennsylvania

PRL's Lebanon facility is known as the "Home of Precision" for its dedication to meeting the most exacting standards in machined components.

  • Manufacturing space. 107,000 square feet
  • Quality. ASNT National Certifications (VT/MT/PT/RT) and NAVSEA 250-1500-1 Certified (VT/PT)
  • Employees. 140 skilled, certified and dedicated workers
  • Number of machines. 37

Find out more about what we can do for you.

We'd love to start a conversation about how we can help deliver the mission-critical components you need. Simply request a quote with your specifications and we'll get right back to you. Thank you.
